data.description: </br><b>Job Description </b></br><p paraeid="{32f295c9-10e9-4925-b267-3d02c81dd0b5}{203}" paraid="1707722027"><strong>Job Description: </strong></p><p paraeid="{32f295c9-10e9-4925-b267-3d02c81dd0b5}{209}" paraid="281907641">Like to be creative and explore new technology platforms? Have an eye for efficiency and enjoy tackling unique problems? The Internal Tools team is a multi-skilled development team looking for a talented software engineer to aid our business objectives. This role will allow exposure to multiple technology platforms and coding languages while collaborating across several departments. Come ready to create, innovate and be an active member of our team. Join BAE to broaden your skills while making a direct impact to our business. </p><p paraeid="{7d3feb8d-02e6-4be5-9dff-e0dc65873ca5}{16}" paraid="875793888"><strong>About Us: </strong></p><p paraeid="{7d3feb8d-02e6-4be5-9dff-e0dc65873ca5}{22}" paraid="1026492268">At BAE Systems, we're dedicated to innovating for the future and protecting those who protect us. The Navigation and Sensor Systems business in Cedar Rapids, IA is a growing business area developing the next generation of advanced military Global Positioning Systems (GPS) products. The Internal Tools team within the business is a cross-functional team supporting BAE’s mission by developing innovative software tools to aid business applications and processes. Our goal is to innovate the way we work by increasing efficiency and productivity. </p><p paraeid="{7d3feb8d-02e6-4be5-9dff-e0dc65873ca5}{70}" paraid="1338825392"><strong>Internship Summary: </strong></p><p paraeid="{7d3feb8d-02e6-4be5-9dff-e0dc65873ca5}{80}" paraid="76455761">In this position, you’ll be an active member of the Internal Tools team and work on projects that individuals across the business benefit from. Opportunities may include: </p><ul role="list"><li 335552541="" aria-setsize="-1" data-aria-level="1" data-aria-posinset="1" data-f="" data-leveltext="" data-list-defn-props="{"><p paraeid="{7d3feb8d-02e6-4be5-9dff-e0dc65873ca5}{94}" paraid="1462443347">Write custom software to bring enhancements to our current toolset </p></li></ul><ul role="list"><li 335552541="" aria-setsize="-1" data-aria-level="1" data-aria-posinset="2" data-f="" data-leveltext="" data-list-defn-props="{"><p paraeid="{7d3feb8d-02e6-4be5-9dff-e0dc65873ca5}{104}" paraid="495270742">Architect and develop brand new software solutions </p></li></ul><ul role="list"><li 335552541="" aria-setsize="-1" data-aria-level="1" data-aria-posinset="3" data-f="" data-leveltext="" data-list-defn-props="{"><p paraeid="{7d3feb8d-02e6-4be5-9dff-e0dc65873ca5}{110}" paraid="2100848606">Design custom scripts and batch files that interact with current business systems </p></li></ul><ul role="list"><li 335552541="" aria-setsize="-1" data-aria-level="1" data-aria-posinset="4" data-f="" data-leveltext="" data-list-defn-props="{"><p paraeid="{7d3feb8d-02e6-4be5-9dff-e0dc65873ca5}{116}" paraid="349358695">Capture technical requirements for new products based on customer needs </p></li></ul><ul role="list"><li 335552541="" aria-setsize="-1" data-aria-level="1" data-aria-posinset="5" data-f="" data-leveltext="" data-list-defn-props="{"><p paraeid="{7d3feb8d-02e6-4be5-9dff-e0dc65873ca5}{130}" paraid="1291081926">Design software test cases to ensure low rates of defect introduction </p></li></ul><ul role="list"><li 335552541="" aria-setsize="-1" data-aria-level="1" data-aria-posinset="6" data-f="" data-leveltext="" data-list-defn-props="{"><p paraeid="{7d3feb8d-02e6-4be5-9dff-e0dc65873ca5}{136}" paraid="1477694019">Provide general support on products within the team’s management </p></li></ul><ul role="list"><li 335552541="" aria-setsize="-1" data-aria-level="1" data-aria-posinset="7" data-f="" data-leveltext="" data-list-defn-props="{"><p paraeid="{7d3feb8d-02e6-4be5-9dff-e0dc65873ca5}{150}" paraid="59508017">Participate in code reviews </p></li></ul><p paraeid="{7d3feb8d-02e6-4be5-9dff-e0dc65873ca5}{156}" paraid="1242666680">Additionally, you will participate in BAE Systems' nationwide LEAP Internship & Co-op Program, where you will Learn, Engage, Apply, and Progress within the company. The LEAP Program will provide you with the opportunity to work alongside experienced professionals on impactful projects, engage in career development opportunities, and network with our business leaders and the other students in the program. </p><p paraeid="{7d3feb8d-02e6-4be5-9dff-e0dc65873ca5}{166}" paraid="1449562962">Because this role involves a combination of collaborative/in-person and independent work, it will take the form of a hybrid work format, with time split between working onsite and remotely. </p><p lang="EN-US" paraeid="{3f400836-6f40-4b2a-b7ed-1e6948537b6a}{192}" adhere to a hybrid schedule (on-site 60% of the time) </p></li></ul></br></br><b>Required Education, Experience, & Skills </b></br><ul role="list"><li 335552541="" aria-setsize="-1" paraeid="{fe9ed40e-3307-4aec-aae4-f6177c1cc5af}{67}" paraid="1992587693">Currently in junior or senior year for a bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent </p></li></ul><br><br><b>Pay Information</b><br>Full-Time Salary Range: $45526 - $61491<br><br>Please note: This range is based on our market pay structures. However, individual salaries are determined by a variety of factors including, but not limited to: business considerations, local market conditions, and internal equity, as well as candidate qualifications, such as skills, education, and experience.<br><br>Temporary employees generally are not eligible for BAE Systems benefits, but can elect to participate in the 401(k) savings plan. Temporary employees working 20+ hours per week are eligible for medical benefits, the employee assistance program, and business travel accident insurance.<br></br></br><b>About BAE Systems Electronic Systems </b></br>BAE Systems, Inc. is the U.S. subsidiary of BAE Systems plc, an international defense, aerospace and security company which delivers a full range of products and services for air, land and naval forces, as well as advanced electronics, security, information technology solutions and customer support services. Improving the future and protecting lives is an ambitious mission, but it’s what we do at BAE Systems. Working here means using your passion and ingenuity where it counts – defending national security with breakthrough technology, superior products, and intelligence solutions. As you develop the latest technology and defend national security, you will continually hone your skills on a team—making a big impact on a global scale. At BAE Systems, you’ll find a rewarding career that truly makes a difference. Electronic Systems (ES) is the global innovator behind BAE Systems’ game-changing defense and commercial electronics. Exploiting every electron, we push the limits of what is possible, giving our customers the edge and our employees opportunities to change the world. Our products and capabilities can be found everywhere – from the depths of the ocean to the far reaches of space. At our core are more than 14,000 highly talented Electronic Systems employees with the brightest minds in the industry, we make an impact – for our customers and the communities we serve.<br><br>This position will be posted for at least 5 calendar days. The posting will remain active until the position is filled, or a qualified pool of candidates is identified.
